price: Zulmedenler azabı gördükleri zaman, artık onlardan bu azap, hafifletilmeyecek ve onlara mühlet de verilmeyecektir.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَءَا ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ فَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā raā alladhīna ẓalamū al-ʿadhāba falā yukhaffafu ʿanhum walā hum yunẓarūna
